fields.name: Sofas & Armchairs
fields.description: Our sofas come in a range of plush, stylish fabrics with bold design. We use easy-care and long-lasting materials to make sure your sofa will be looking as good as it did on the day it arrived for years to come. Ethically and locally handcrafted, using sustainable wood and production practices.

fields.name: Decor
fields.description: Add the finishing touches to your space with our chic home decor items. Explore a world of decorative accents, including vibrant rugs, stylish lighting, eye-catching wall art, and more. Each piece is thoughtfully chosen to complement your aesthetic and elevate the ambiance of your home.

fields.name: Lightning
fields.description: Illuminate and bring new aspects to your rooms and spaces with our stylish variety of lights and lamps. Unleash the brilliance and efficiency of cutting-edge technology with our Lightning category. We bring you a curated selection of lightning products designed to illuminate your world and enhance your lifestyle.

fields.name: Furniture
fields.description: Discover furniture that combines form and function. Our carefully curated selection includes everything from comfortable sofas and statement chairs to elegant dining sets and versatile storage solutions. Crafted with precision and designed for comfort, our furniture enhances every room in your home.

fields.name: Scented candle in glass holder
fields.description: Scented candle in a patterned glass holder. Diameter 8 cm, height 11 cm. Burn time 60 hours.

fields.name: Children's rattan lounge chair
fields.description: Comfortable rattan lounge chair for children that adds a playful and decorative detail to any room. Perfect for reading, drawing or resting between adventures. Supplied fully assembled. Depth 39 cm. Seat height 27 cm. Width 43 cm. Total height 48 cm.

fields.name: Hila
fields.description: Hila ceiling lamp screen in white paper with natural wood veneer Ø 30 cm

fields.name: Printed cotton cushion cover
fields.description: Cushion cover in a cotton weave with a print motif and a zip along one side.

fields.name: Metal side table
fields.description: Sculptural side table in lightweight metal that has been treated to create a rustic, cast-iron look. Diameter of table top 28.4 cm. Height 55 cm. Supplied flat-packed, ready to assemble.

fields.name: Wooden frame
fields.description: Wooden frame with plastic glazing. MDF back with metal hangers. Screws not included.

fields.name: Blok
fields.description:
Blok 3 seater sofa with right-hand chaise longue in beige, 300 cm

- With generous proportions & unique design, this sofa is your place to get comfy and be stylish in your living room.

- Upholstery with anti-stain treatment, just clean it with a damp cloth and dry it immediately.

- Local production. Made in Europe using artisanal processes, reducing CO2 emissions for a lower environmental impact.

- Design created by the Kave Home team. Available in a choice of colours.

fields.name: Cruilles
fields.description: Cruilles natural fiber ceiling lamp shade in a natural finish, Ø 100 cm

fields.name: Jalousie-door cabinet
fields.description: Cabinet in MDF with lacquered ash veneer, rounded corners and jalousie doors in pine. Adjustable shelf and painted metal legs. Easy to assemble, screws included. Depth 36 cm. Width 80 cm. Height 77 cm. Weight 16 kg.

fields.name: Malachi
fields.description: Malachi ceiling lamp with glazed glass and travertine stone

fields.name: Makai
fields.description: Metal Makai ceiling lamp with black finish Ø 87 cm

fields.name: Oaq
fields.description:
- 3-seater sofa in beige cotton fabric, which may have visible imperfections. Recycled PET down feather-effect filler.

- Structure in oak wood veneer with a natural finish. Backrests, armrests, and seats with removable covers.

- Local production. Made in Europe using artisanal processes, reducing CO2 emissions for a lower environmental impact.

- A Kave Cares design: FSC™ certified wood from sustainable forests with controlled felling.

- Exclusive design piece developed by the R&D team at Kave Home for its Premium range of products.

fields.name: Martina
fields.description:
Martina 3-seater sofa in off-white shearling 246 cm

- 3-seater sofa upholstered in fabric made of 100% recycled polyester. One metre of its upholstery contains at least 32 recycled 500 ml bottles.

- It has a medium seat. Exclusive design created and conceived by the Kave Home team.

- Fabric with Oeko Tex® certification that guarantees the use of materials free from harmful substances.

- Local production. Made in Europe with artisanal processes, reducing CO2 emissions for a lower environmental impact.

- Cushions not included. Complete it with the rest of the collection.

fields.name: 3-pack mini stoneware vases
fields.description: Set of small, glazed stoneware vases in various shapes. Supplied in a cardboard box. Height 10 cm.
